prompt.preamble:
We are testing a system for understanding people's interest in reading different kinds of online articles.
For example, you might be interested in articles about some topics, but not about others.
prompt.task_description: your preferences of what kinds of online articles you would like to read
prompt.final: In the final part of the study, you will give feedback on a test set of article headline and descriptions, which will enable us to see how well a chatbot reading your responses has learned what you like and dislike.
prompt.evaluation: Please indicate whether you would like to read the following articles: "yes" if you would, "no" if you would not.

conversation_history.message:
Are you interested in the following article? Website Name: CulinaryWorld
Title: Mushroom Foraging: An Uncharted Hobby for Gourmet Enthusiasts 
Description: Dive into the world of mushroom foraging and learn how this surprising hobby can lead you to discover new flavors and recipes. Expand your gourmet repertoire with this beginner's guide to foraging.".
I feel that it may be interesting and worth at least looking at.

Are you interested in the following article? Website Name: QuantumEdge
Title: Breaking the Quantum Computing Barrier: A Leap towards Technological Singularity
Description: Can mankind push the envelope of what's technologically possible? Dive into the enthralling world of Quantum Computing, where we decode the latest breakthroughs and their implications for AI and the concept of Singularity.
It seems like a interesting topic.

Are you interested in the following article? Website Name: EcoBalance
Title: Sustainable Fashion: The Future of Apparel Industry 
Description: Take a deep dive into the emerging world of sustainable fashion. Discover how fashion giants and startups are innovating to reduce the industry's carbon footprint while offering stylish and affordable options. Learn about the challenges they face, and how you can contribute to this eco-friendly movement.
I am always interested in fashion and following the latest trends.  I am curious to know what their approach is to being environmentally friendly.

Are you interested in the following article? Website Name: AstroGate
Title: Mars Terraforming: The Future of Human Civilization Beyond Earth
Description: Get the latest insights into the scientific and logistical challenges of Mars terraforming. Explore cutting-edge research into making the red planet hospitable for human life, the role of AI and robotics in this pursuit, and ethical implications of interplanetary colonization. Discover how this monumental endeavor could reshape the future of human civilization.
I have no interest in this article.

Are you interested in the following article? Website Name: ArtRevolution
Title: The Intersection of Digital Art and Cryptocurrency: A Deep Dive into NFTs
Description: Explore the fascinating world where art and technology collide - Non-Fungible Tokens (NFTs). This article examines how digital artists are using blockchain technology to authenticate and monetize their work in the crypto art market. Is this the future of art or just a fad? Get insights into the pros and cons of the NFT boom, its impact on artists and collectors, and what it means for the democratization of art.
I have always been curious about NFTs and how they work so I would be interested in seeing what I can learn from this article.

query_prompt.content:
Your task is to learn what topics a user is interested in reading online article about. People's interests are broad, so you should seek to understand their interests across many topics; in other words, go for breadth rather than depth. Do not assume a user has given a complete answer to any question, so make sure to keep probing different types of interests.

Come up with a potential edge case to learn as much information as you can about what their desired behavior should be under different circumstances.
Make sure the edge case addresses different aspects of the system than the edge cases that have already been considered.

An example edge case is: Are you interested in the following article? Website Name: TechTalkDaily
Title: 10 Must-Have Gadgets for 2023: A Comprehensive Guide
Description: Discover the top 10 gadgets that will revolutionize your daily life in 2023. From smart home devices to the latest wearables, we've got you covered with our comprehensive guide.

Current cases:
- [Q] -> [A]

Generate the most informative edge case that, when answered, will reveal the most about the desired behavior beyond what has already been queried for above. Generate the edge case in the following format, and nothing else: "Are you interested in the following article? [edge case]"
